}}'''Windfola''' was a grey horse of the [[Rohirrim]].

Windfola was the horse that carried [[Éowyn]] (in the guise of [[Dernhelm]]) the long miles from [[Dunharrow]] to the [[Pelennor Fields]], secretly accompanied by [[Meriadoc Brandybuck]].<ref>{{RK|V3}}</ref> Windfola was in the charge of the [[Rohirrim]] in the [[Battle of the Pelennor Fields]], but at the onset of the [[Witch-king|Lord of the Nazgûl]], the horse went mad with fear, threw his riders, and fled in panic. Left behind by their steed, Éowyn and Merry brought down the [[Witch-king]] of [[Angmar]], but by then Windfola had left them far behind on the battlefield.<ref>{{RK|V6}}</ref>

==Etymology==
Windfola means "wind-foal" in the [[Rohan language|language]] of the Rohirrim.<ref>{{HM|N}}, p. 764</ref>

==Portrayal in adaptations==
===Windfola in adaptations===
<gallery mode="traditional" widths="250px" heights="150px">
File:The Lord of the Rings - The Return of the King - Windfola.jpg|''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King]]''
</gallery>
'''2003: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King]]'':'''
:Éowyn rides a brown-coated horse, which is presumably killed when it is crushed by the falling [[Oliphaunts|Oliphaunt]]. [[The Lord of the Rings Trading Card Game]] expansion ''The Return of the King'' identifies it as Windfola.<ref>[https://www.ccgtrader.net/card/7135/windfola Windfola - Lord of the Rings TCG | CCG Trader]</ref> The horse used was named Dublin.
